title: Safely deploying on the cutting edge
description:
Safely deploying on the cutting edge

Eric Holscher

This talk will go through the deployment system that we have built at
Urban Airship. It will cover the process that allows us to automate our
deployments, making it safe to deploy at any time. It's built on Fabric,
Gunicorn, Virtualenv, Rsync, Supervisord, and Python. We end up with
fully isolated environments for our services that are easy to manage.
